attributes.action: repatriate criminals from Britain their own country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the paedophile repatriated to Britain after 55 years I commend the Australian government for their principles.  We have hundreds of people in this country who should be repatriated to their own countries but stay here after committing crimes on the grounds that it is unsafe for them to return to their own country.  If they abuse our hospitality let them go back and take what comes.  We are a soft touch to the whole world.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
